name: Super Pongout
description:
Super Pongout is a pong-like game that incorporates tile-breaking from breakout into your paddle in pong. Hit balls while moving to also curve your shots to pass your opponents. You can play with up to 9 balls at once for more intense action! The game also includes a power-up system allowing players to pick them up if they can aim their shots well. Scoring in Super Pongout is a tug-of-war system so you aren't ever out of the game until you run out of score!

Controls:

Player 1 uses W and A to move up and down. Player 2 uses the Up and Down arrow keys.
